Name: Hobgoblin
Description: Darkvision 60ft, passive perception 10, health can range from 11-11(2D8+2)

CharacterAttack.Name: Longbow
CharacterAttack.Description: +3 to hit, disadvantaged past 150ft, single target

Ability.Title: Martial Advantage
Ability.Description: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

CharacterAttack.Name: Multiattack
CharacterAttack.Description: The hobgoblin makes two greatsword attacks.

CharacterAttack.Name: Greatsword
CharacterAttack.Description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, single target

CharacterAttack.Name: Javelin
CharacterAttack.Description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5ft melee or disadvantage after 30ft, single target.

CharacterAttack.Name: Leadership
CharacterAttack.Description: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the hobgoblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

Ability.Title: Martial Advantage
Ability.Description: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isnâ€™t incapacitated.
